name: Hit 'em harder
description:
The theme

For the theme, we decided to combine the almost incompatible genres of beat 'em up / fighting with a text-based controlling system. That means that you have to be quick on the keyboard!

The gameplay

You control your character by telling him, how to block and how to hit your enemy. There are five regions in total, H(ead) L(eft), H(ead) R(ight), B(ody) L(eft) , B(ody) R(ight), and the legs. Each of These regions can be combined with a "hit" or a "block" command (except from the legs). The legs are targeted with "kick", the defense is "jump". In addition, head hits can be avoided by "duck"ing. 

But there are not only plain commands you can use. You also unlock a variety of Cards that improve your damage, decrease you opponents defense or give you cool (and slightly stereotypical) extra boni.

Combos and Combo Cards lead to a variety of ways to kill your Opponent- the only important Thing is that you can type and think at the same time: because that is what you will be generally lacking.
